question: Which country is the host of the multinational Exercise Desert Flag?
explanation:
Exercise Desert Flag is a multinational exercise, which is to be held in the United Arab Emirates. Ten countries are to take part in this exercise including India, France and the U.S. This exercise will be held for three weeks this month.
This semi-annual exercise will involve multiple, intensive air combat sorties. IAFâ€™s Su-30-MKI and C-17s fighter jets took off recently to participate in this exercise.
